document.title: Internet activities
title: Internet activities
longtitle0_0: (Share of women/men aged 16 to 74 who used the internet for participating in social networks,
longtitle0_1: in % of all women/men the same age who used the internet within the last three months)
longtitle1_0: (Share of women/men aged 16 to 74 who used the internet for internet banking,
longtitle1_1: in % of all women/men the same age who used the internet within the last three months)
longtitle2_0: (Share of women/men aged 16 to 74 who used the internet for job searching or sending an application,
longtitle2_1: in % of all women/men the same age who used the internet within the last three months)
longtitle3_0: (Share of women/men aged 16 to 74 who used the internet for reading online news,
longtitle3_1: in % of all women/men the same age who used the internet within the last three months)
longtitle4_0: (Share of women/men aged 16 to 74 who used the internet for telephoning or video calls,
longtitle4_1: in % of all women/men the same age who used the internet within the last three months)
longtitle5_0: (Share of women/men aged 16 to 74 who used the internet for sending/receiving e-mails,
longtitle5_1: in % of all women/men the same age who used the internet within the last three months)
footnote_2: Data for job search refer to 2015
instructions0: Select a category to see the comparison between women and men for the EU and the Member States.
instructions1_part1: In order to sort by women or by men, rank by clicking on the arrows (
instructions1_part2: ) below the bar chart. To select data for only women or only men, uncheck/check the boxes.
informations: Reading online news refers to reading online news sites, newspapers and news magazines.
dataset-header: Click on link to get to dataset
embed_instruction: Copy this code and paste it in your Website.
tooltip_F: % of women aged 16 to 74 who used the internet within the last three months
tooltip_M: % of men aged 16 to 74 who used the internet within the last three months
